body:
@spastorino Not sure this fixes #11834.
Sandbox is still prematurely rolled back at #clear_reloadable_connections, so this fix actually makes it harder to debug now:

```ruby
rails c -s
Loading development environment in sandbox (Rails 4.1.0.beta)
Any modifications you make will be rolled back on exit
2.0.0-p247 :001 > Bar.count
   (0.1ms)  SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "bars"
 => 1 
2.0.0-p247 :002 > reload!
Reloading... ## ==> sandbox clears here
 => true 
2.0.0-p247 :003 > Bar.delete_all
  SQL (132.9ms)  DELETE FROM "bars"
 => 1 
2.0.0-p247 :004 > exit  ## => no sandbox rollback now
➜  rails c
2.0.0-p247 :001 > Bar.count
   (0.1ms)  SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "bars"
 => 0 
```
